Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring consumer reporting agencies to provide a consumer's information to such consumer at no cost
Summary: Relates to requiring consumer reporting agencies to provide a consumer's information to such consumer at no cost.
LawCode: Amd ยง380-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring consumer reporting agencies to provide a consumer's information to such consumer at no cost
